mapper.insert: INSERT into users ( username, password, display_name, enabled, registration_date, registration_token ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{displayName}, #{enabled}, #{registrationDate}, #{registrationToken} )

INSERT into subscriptions ( email, podcast_id, subscription_date, playlist ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{podcastId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{playlist} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE subscription_date=values(subscription_date), playlist=values(playlist)
mapper.select: SELECT username, password, display_name, enabled, registration_date FROM users WHERE username = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT into podcasts_votes ( username, vote, podcast_id, voted_on ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{vote}, #{podcastId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE voted_on=values(voted_on), vote=values(vote);

INSERT into podcasts_votes ( username, vote, podcast_id, episode_id, voted_on ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{vote}, #{podcastId}, #{episodeId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE voted_on=values(voted_on), vote=values(vote);
mapper.select: SELECT p.PODCAST_ID, p.URL, p.identifier, p.NUMBER_VISITORS, p.DESCRIPTION, p.PODCAST_IMAGE_URL, p.TITLE, p.last_episode_url, p.title_in_url, p.publication_date, p.media_type, e.description as episode_description, e.link as episode_link, e.media_url as episode_media_url, e.media_type as episode_media_type, e.title as episode_title, e.episode_id, e.publication_date as episode_pub_date, e.title_in_url as episode_title_in_url, e.is_new FROM podcasts p, subscriptions s, episodes e WHERE s.email = #{userId} AND s.podcast_id= p.podcast_id AND p.podcast_id = e.podcast_id AND p.availability=200 AND e.availability = 200 ORDER BY p.publication_date DESC, e.publication_date DESC
SELECT s.playlist FROM subscriptions s WHERE s.email=#{userId}

SELECT p.PODCAST_ID, p.URL, p.identifier, p.NUMBER_VISITORS, p.DESCRIPTION, p.PODCAST_IMAGE_URL, p.TITLE, p.last_episode_url, p.title_in_url, p.publication_date, p.media_type, e.description as episode_description, e.link as episode_link, e.media_url as episode_media_url, e.media_type as episode_media_type, e.title as episode_title, e.episode_id, e.publication_date as episode_pub_date, e.title_in_url as episode_title_in_url, e.is_new FROM podcasts p, subscriptions s, episodes e WHERE s.email = #{userId} AND s.playlist= #{playlist} AND s.podcast_id= p.podcast_id AND p.podcast_id = e.podcast_id AND p.availability=200 AND e.availability = 200 ORDER BY p.publication_date DESC, e.publication_date DESC

SELECT e.podcast_id, e.episode_id, e.title as title, e.description, e.link, e.media_url, e.publication_date as episode_pub_date, e.title_in_url as episode_title_in_url, e.media_type, e.is_new, e.length, e.enclosure_type, p.title as podcast_title, p.podcast_image_url, p.title_in_url as podcast_title_in_url FROM episodes e, podcasts p, subscriptions s, users u WHERE u.username = #{value} AND s.email = #{value} AND s.podcast_id= p.podcast_id AND e.podcast_id = p.podcast_id AND e.availability=200 AND e.is_new = 1 AND p.availability=200 ORDER BY e.publication_date DESC
